Melee Weapon Attack:
 +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the
damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

languages: understands Common and Giant but can't speak
name: Ogre Zombie
